summary: The Federal Protective Service (FPS) is responsible for protecting more than 9,000 federal buildings and ensuring the safety of the people within them. FPS is completely funded by the fees it charges agencies for its services. In FY 2020, FPS began calculating its basic security fee for each building based on each building's past use of security services. Previously, this fee was based on square...
title: Federal Protective Service: Projected Outcomes of the New Fee Structure on Tenant Agencies' Costs
